nodes.documentation:
Check that the game can be revealed and that the
current sender is a player who is yet to call reveal()
nodes.name: canRevealMoves

nodes.documentation: Check that boards can be revealed.
nodes.name: canRevealBoard

nodes.documentation: Check that game can be joined.
nodes.name: canJoin

nodes.documentation:
Join the game
@param boardHash_ Hash of player's board
nodes.name: join

nodes.documentation:
Reveal moves.
The moves are represented a 256-bit uint. For a given move (x, y) the
bit position is calculated as 2^(boardSize * x + y)
   * @param moves_ The moves by this player (each bit represents a move)
nodes.name: revealMoves

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Game.Player storage pointer,struct Game.Player storage pointer)

nodes.documentation:
Reveal board.
   * The board array is an array of triplets, whereby each triplet represents
a ship, specifying (x,y,isVertical).
   * @param board_ This player's board as an array
nodes.name: revealBoard
calculateHits

nodes.documentation: Fallback should revert().
Convenience method for fetching metadata in a single call.
nodes.name: getMetadata
